Contacts Address: Mysore Rd, Halsurpete, Nagarathpete, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560002, India Phone: +91-181-2480918 Email: gentlecloud@gmail.com Reviews I absolutely adore my GentleCloud bean bag chair! It's become my go-to spot for relaxation after a long day. The fabric is so soft, and the size is perfect for curling up with a book or watching movies. Plus, the color options are fantastic, allowing me to match it perfectly with my home decor. Highly recommend! I'm beyond impressed with the GentleCloud bean bag chair. Not only is it super comfortable, but it's also surprisingly versatile. Whether I'm gaming for hours or simply lounging with friends, this chair provides unbeatable support. The fabric is top-notch, and it's easy to clean, which is a huge plus. Definitely worth every penny! As a busy mom, finding moments of peace and quiet can be a challenge. But ever since we got our GentleCloud bean bag chair, I finally have a cozy retreat to escape to. It's incredibly comfortable and supportive, making it ideal for both lounging and napping. My kids love it too! It's definitely a must-have for any household. As someone who values quality and comfort, I can confidently say that GentleCloud exceeds expectations. The bean bag chair is incredibly well-made and offers the perfect balance of softness and firmness. It's the ultimate spot for relaxation after a hectic day. Plus, the minimalist design fits seamlessly into any space. Highly recommend! I was hesitant at first to invest in a bean bag chair, but I'm so glad I chose GentleCloud! The quality is exceptional, and the chair is incredibly durable. It's become my favorite spot for reading and catching up on work. Plus, the modern design adds a stylish touch to my living room. Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase! I've tried many bean bag chairs in the past, but none compare to the GentleCloud experience. From the moment I sank into it, I knew I had found my new favorite piece of furniture. The craftsmanship is exceptional, and the attention to detail is evident in every stitch. Whether I'm watching TV or working from home, this chair provides unmatched comfort and support. 10/10 would recommend! < > Frequently Asked Questions How much weight load can a bag chair support? The weight load depends on the specific model of the sack chair, but they can usually support between 100 and 200 kg depending on the material and construction. Can the sack chair be used outdoors? Yes, there are special models of sack chairs for outdoor use, made of waterproof and weatherproof materials. How do I care for a mech chair? Most sack chairs have removable covers that can be easily removed and washed in a washing machine. It is also recommended to periodically fluff the filling. How long does it take to deliver a sack chair? Delivery time depends on the location and the shipping method chosen, it usually takes between one to three days. Can the sack chair be used for children to play? Yes, bag chairs are often used for playing and entertaining children due to their softness and comfort. How do you choose the right size of a sack chair? The size of the sack chair is chosen depending on preference and the place where it will be used. For home use, sizes from medium to large are usually suitable, and for children's rooms - compact models. pages.privacy-policy: GentleCloud Privacy Policy: Safeguarding Your Data and Privacy GentleCloud Privacy Policy At GentleCloud, we take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information. Information We Collect We collect information you provide directly to us when you use our services. This may include personal information such as your name, email address, and payment information. We may also collect information automatically when you interact with our services, such as your IP address and device information. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect for various purposes, including to provide and improve our services, to communicate with you, to process transactions, and to personalize your experience. We may also use your information to comply with legal obligations and protect our rights. Information Sharing We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business. Data Security We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the revised policy will become effective immediately upon posting. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at gentlecloud@gmail.com. GentleCloud Additionally Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions © Copyright 2024. All rights reserved
